statements: SELECT id, account_number, debt_amount, risk_level, collection_strategy FROM debt_management_teams;
SELECT account_number, debt_amount, risk_level FROM debt_management_teams WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM debt_management_teams WHERE risk_level = 'high';
SELECT id, account_number, debt_amount FROM debt_management_teams ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT id, account_number, risk_level FROM debt_management_teams WHERE debt_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM debt_management_teams WHERE risk_level = 'low' ORDER BY account_number DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, account_number, debt_amount FROM debt_management_teams WHERE risk_level = 'medium' ORDER BY debt_amount ASC
SELECT collection_strategy, account_number FROM debt_management_teams WHERE risk_level = 'high' ORDER BY collection_strategy
SELECT id, debt_amount, risk_level FROM debt_management_teams WHERE debt_amount > 5000 ORDER BY risk_level
SELECT * FROM debt_management_teams WHERE collection_strategy LIKE '%letter%' ORDER BY id
SELECT account_id, account_name, debt_amount, risk_level FROM DebtAccounts;
SELECT * FROM DebtAccounts ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT account_name, debt_amount FROM DebtAccounts WHERE risk_level='High';
SELECT account_id, SUM(collection_amount) AS total_collections FROM CollectionEfforts GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT account_id, MAX(collection_amount) AS largest_collection FROM CollectionEfforts GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM DebtAccounts WHERE debt_amount > 5000 ORDER BY account_id DESC
SELECT account_name, debt_amount FROM DebtAccounts WHERE risk_level = 'High'
SELECT account_id, account_name, debt_amount, risk_level FROM DebtAccounts WHERE debt_amount < 1000
SELECT account_id, account_name, debt_amount FROM DebtAccounts WHERE risk_level IN ('Low', 'Moderate')
SELECT * FROM DebtAccounts JOIN CollectionEfforts ON DebtAccounts.account_id = CollectionEfforts.account_id WHERE collection_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM debt_accounts;
SELECT account_id, debt_amount FROM debt_accounts WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT account_id, customer_id, debt_amount FROM debt_accounts WHERE debt_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM debt_collections ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, COUNT(collection_id) AS num_collections FROM debt_collections GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM debt_accounts WHERE account_status = 'Active';
SELECT account_id, customer_id, debt_amount FROM debt_accounts WHERE debt_amount > 1000 ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, trend_date, trend_type FROM debt_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Negative' ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT collection_id, account_id, collector_id, collection_date FROM debt_collections WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT debt_accounts.account_id, debt_accounts.customer_id, debt_collections.collection_date, debt_trends.trend_type FROM debt_accounts INNER JOIN debt_collections ON debt_accounts.account_id = debt_collections.account_id INNER JOIN debt_trends ON debt_accounts.account_id = debt_trends.account_id;
SELECT * FROM debt_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, debt_amount FROM debt_accounts WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT account_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM debt_payments GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM collection_strategy WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100;
SELECT account_id, MAX(risk_score) AS highest_risk_score FROM debt_analysis;
SELECT account_name, debt_amount FROM debt_accounts WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM debt_payments WHERE payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT account_name, debt_amount, risk_level FROM debt_accounts WHERE risk_level = 1 OR risk_level = 4;
SELECT da.analysis_date, da.risk_score, ds.strategy_name FROM debt_analysis da JOIN collection_strategy ds ON da.account_id = ds.strategy_id;
SELECT account_id, account_name, debt_amount, risk_level FROM debt_accounts WHERE debt_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM debt_analysis ORDER BY debt_amount ASC;
SELECT account_id, debt_status FROM debt_analysis WHERE debt_status='Pending';
SELECT account_id, debt_amount FROM debt_analysis WHERE debt_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_accounts ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_date FROM collection_strategies WHERE effectiveness_score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM debt_analysis WHERE debt_amount > 5000 ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, debt_amount, debt_status FROM debt_analysis WHERE debt_status = 'pending' ORDER BY account_id;
SELECT strategy_name, effectiveness_score FROM collection_strategies WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT member_name, role, team_id FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Team Lead' ORDER BY member_name;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_accounts WHERE risk_score > 75 ORDER BY risk_score DESC, account_name ASC;
